# CFUserNotificationCallBack

**Type Alias**

Callback invoked when an asynchronous user notification dialog is dismissed.

## Declaration

```swift
typealias CFUserNotificationCallBack = (CFUserNotification?, CFOptionFlags) -> Void
```

## Parameters

- **userNotification**: The user notification that was dismissed.
- **responseFlags**: On return, contains flags identifying how the notification was dismissed, the state of any checkboxes, and the selected item of the pop-up menu. See [doc://com.apple.corefoundation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFUserNotificationReceiveResponse(_:_:_:)] for details.
title: CFUserNotificationCallBack
